snippet: Markets were little changed on the final day of a strong month that wiped away steep losses from the beginning of the year.
abstract: Stocks drop on quiet last trading day of volatile first quarter.
lead_paragraph: Markets were little changed on the final day of a strong month that wiped away steep losses from the beginning of the year.

headline.main: Tranquil Last Trading Day of Stormy Quarter
headline.print_headline: Tranquil Last Trading Day of Stormy Quarter
